creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Buddhist priest robe made up of over-lapping pieces of yellow brocaded satin of twining flower and leaf design.  At the center top an applied square of yellow satin on which is embroidered in satin stitch in colors, the Buddhist emblem of lotus and holy flame.  No lining.
title: Buddhist Robe
